text: Contemporary R&B; is a music genre of R&B.; It mixes rhythm and blues, soul, funk, pop, hip hop, electronic and dance. Contemporary R&B; is currently a dominant music genre for the Top 40 radios. Artists of this type of music includes, Whitney Houston, Beyonc√©, Michael Jackson, Mariah Carey, and Stevie Wonder. Contemporary R&B; became a popular music genre after the disco era in the 1980s. Contemporary R&B; is an African American type of music, however, there has been other artists who are not African American that record contemporary R&B.; Such as Justin Timberlake, Ariana Grande, Christina Aguilera, Justin Beiber, and Bruno Mars ==References== Category:R&B; music
title: Contemporary R&B
